cause.description:
Don't worry this is all in good fun. As many of you already kno Kristine is aka Krusty.....but did u kno the origin of that nick name?....well the only rash conclusion that I could come to was that it was because she has a crusty gi....so u change it up a bit and u get the nick name KRUSTY!
Don't ask her about this....she'll only deny it...like anyone else would.
1. The days of the crusty cover up for krusty must end.
cause.mission: spread to the world the horrors of the crusty gi that Krusty has.
cause.name: Why is it so Krusty?
